titles.title: A bill to waive certain limitations on assistance for losses resulting from Hurricane Andrew, Typhoon Omar, or Hurricane Iniki, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Waives specified limitations on assistance for losses incurred during the 1992 and subsequent crop years resulting from Hurricanes Andrew and Iniki or Typhoon Omar. Makes rural housing assistance applicable to low-income families and hazard mitigation applicable to Hawaii as a result of losses from such events.
